actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to extend the authorizations of appropriations contained in the National Foundation on the Arts and Humanities Act of 1965 and the Museum Services Act.
subjects: Federal aid to the arts and humanities
subjects_top_term: Federal aid to the arts and humanities

summary.text: Amends the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 to extend the authorization of appropriations through fiscal year 1985 for the National Endowment for the Humanities and the National Endowment for the Arts. Sets forth the formula for determining the amount of authorizations for each fiscal year through 1985. Directs the Chairman of the National Endowment for the Arts and the National Endowment for the Humanities to issue guidelines for the receipt of gifts by the Endowments. Amends the Museum Services Act to extend the authorization of appropriations for the purpose of making grants to museums through fiscal year 1985.

titles.title: A bill to extend the authorizations of appropriations contained in the National Foundation on the Arts and Humanities Act of 1965 and the Museum Services Act.
